name: Arataki Itto
desc:
"Hanamizaka Heroics" Arataki Itto

Arataki "The Ultimate TCG Champion" Itto

value.name: Arataki Ichiban
value.desc:
Arataki Itto: Arataki Ichiban

Whatever you do, remember to ride the momentum.

value.text: Reward for inviting Arataki Itto to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

value.name: Arataki Itto
value.desc: The first and greatest head of the Arataki Gang, famed throughout Inazuma City's Hanamizaka... Wait, what? You've never heard of them? Are you trying to be funny here?

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 1 <color=#ffd780>Geo DMG</color> . Summons <color=#ffffff>Ushi</color> . This character gains <color=#ffffff>Superlative Superstrength</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Superlative Superstrength</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the character to which this is attached uses a Charged Attack:</color> Deal +1 DMG. If the Usage(s) are no less than 2, expend 1 less <color=#ffffff>Unaligned Element</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color> (Can stack. Max 3 stacks.)

talent.key: Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!
talent.title: Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 4 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> . This character gains <color=#ffffff>Raging Oni King</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Raging Oni King</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
The character to which this is attached has their <color=#ffffff>Normal Attacks</color> deal +1 DMG, and their <color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> dealt converted to <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds): 2</color>
<color=#ffffff>After the character to which this is attached uses a Normal Attack:</color> Gains <color=#ffffff>Superlative Superstrength</color> . (Once per Round)
<color=#ece5d8>Superlative Superstrength</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the character to which this is attached uses a Charged Attack:</color> Deal +1 DMG. If the Usage(s) are no less than 2, expend 1 less <color=#ffffff>Unaligned Element</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color> (Can stack. Max 3 stacks.)

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>When your active character takes DMG</color> : Decrease DMG taken by 1.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color> . When the Usage is depleted, this card will not be discarded.
<color=#ffffff>Can be triggered once while this Summon is present:</color> When your active character takes DMG, Arataki Itto gains <color=#ffffff>Superlative Superstrength</color> .
End Phase: Discard this card, deal 1 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Superlative Superstrength</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the character to which this is attached uses a Charged Attack:</color> Deal +1 DMG. If the Usage(s) are no less than 2, expend 1 less <color=#ffffff>Unaligned Element</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color> (Can stack. Max 3 stacks.)

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Charged Attack</color>
Before your Action Phase, should the total number of your Elemental Dice be even, your Normal Attack will be considered a Charged Attack.
<color=#ece5d8>Unaligned Element</color>
You may use Elemental Dice of any element to pay this type of cost.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
<color=#ece5d8>Duration (Rounds)</color>
Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.
This card will be discarded immediately once <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.

customize.name: Arataki Itto
customize.desc:
"Hanamizaka Heroics" Arataki Itto

Arataki "The Ultimate TCG Champion" Itto

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Hahahahaha! It's never too late to admit defeat before Arataki 'The Ultimate TCG Champion' Itto!"
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: Arataki Itto's deck places great emphasis on Claymore cards and Charged Attacks, allowing him to fight armed until the very end.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Arataki Itto
customize.desc:
"Hanamizaka Heroics" Arataki Itto

Arataki "The Ultimate TCG Champion" Itto

customize.name: Noelle
customize.desc:
"Chivalric Blossom" Noelle

You can leave arranging the table to her — really, you can.

customize.name: Razor
customize.desc:
"Wolf Boy" Razor

"Cards, hard."

"But… friends…"

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Arataki Itto
customize.desc:
"Hanamizaka Heroics" Arataki Itto

Arataki "The Ultimate TCG Champion" Itto

customize.name: Arataki Ichiban
customize.desc:
Arataki Itto: Arataki Ichiban

Whatever you do, remember to ride the momentum.

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: Arataki Ichiban
customize.desc:
Arataki Itto: Arataki Ichiban

Whatever you do, remember to ride the momentum.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Well, not to brag, but after being locked in a grueling duel for seven days and six nights straight non-stop, I'd modestly say that Artaki 'Can't Stop, Won't Stop' Itto is completely invincible! Hahahahahaha!"
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Arataki Itto" starts with the Talent Card "Arataki Ichiban" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Arataki Itto
customize.desc:
"Hanamizaka Heroics" Arataki Itto

Arataki "The Ultimate TCG Champion" Itto

customize.name: Noelle
customize.desc:
"Chivalric Blossom" Noelle

You can leave arranging the table to her — really, you can.

customize.name: Razor
customize.desc:
"Wolf Boy" Razor

"Cards, hard."

"But… friends…"

customize.text:
<color=#ffffffd9>Prerequisite</color>
Reach Player Level 7
Complete 3 challenge objective(s) in Arataki Itto: Friendly

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.
